## grid-iterators package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [circle(cx, cy, r, fill)](./grid-iterators.circle.md) |  |
|  [diagonal2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.diagonal2d.md) | Yields sequence of 2D grid coordinates in diagonal order starting at \[0,0\] and using given <code>cols</code> and <code>rows</code>. Each diagonal starts at y=0 and progresses in -x,+y direction.<!-- -->Ported &amp; modified from original Java code by Christopher Kulla. [https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/DiagonalBucketOrder.java](https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/DiagonalBucketOrder.java) |
|  [hilbert2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.hilbert2d.md) | Yields sequence of 2D grid coordinates along 2D Hilbert curve using given <code>cols</code> and <code>rows</code> (each max. 32768 (2^15)).<!-- -->Ported &amp; modified from original Java code by Christopher Kulla. [https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/HilbertBucketOrder.java](https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/HilbertBucketOrder.java) |
|  [hline(x, y, len)](./grid-iterators.hline.md) |  |
|  [interleaveColumns2d(cols, rows, step)](./grid-iterators.interleavecolumns2d.md) | Yields 2D grid coordinates in the order of interleaved columns with configurable <code>step</code> size (default: 2). I.e. returns columns in this order:<!-- -->- 0, step, 2 \* step, 3 \* step... - 1, 2 \* step + 1, 3 \* step + 1... - etc.[interleaveRows2d()](./grid-iterators.interleaverows2d.md) |
|  [interleaveRows2d(cols, rows, step)](./grid-iterators.interleaverows2d.md) | Similar to [interleaveColumns2d()](./grid-iterators.interleavecolumns2d.md)<!-- -->, but yields 2D grid coordinates in the order of interleaved rows with configurable <code>step</code> size (default: 2). I.e. returns rows in this order:<!-- -->- 0, step, 2 \* step, 3 \* step... - 1, 2 \* step + 1, 3 \* step + 1... - etc.[interleaveColumns2d()](./grid-iterators.interleavecolumns2d.md) |
|  [line(ox, oy, ex, ey)](./grid-iterators.line.md) |  |
|  [random2d(cols, rows, rnd)](./grid-iterators.random2d.md) | Yields 2D grid coordinates in random order w/ support for optional [IRandom](./random.irandom.md) implementation (default: [SYSTEM](./random.system.md) aka <code>Math.random</code>). |
|  [spiral2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.spiral2d.md) | Yields sequence of 2D grid coordinates in outward spiral order starting from the center, given <code>cols</code> and <code>rows</code>.<!-- -->Ported &amp; modified from original Java code by Christopher Kulla. [https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/SpiralBucketOrder.java](https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/SpiralBucketOrder.java) |
|  [vline(x, y, len)](./grid-iterators.vline.md) |  |
|  [zcurve2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.zcurve2d.md) | Yields 2D grid coordinates in Z-curve (Morton) order. A perfect Z-curve is only generated if <code>cols</code> AND <code>rows</code> are equal and a power of 2. Due to using 32bit morton codes, only supports grid sizes up to 32767 (0x7fff) in either dimension. |
|  [zigzagColumns2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.zigzagcolumns2d.md) | Yields sequence of 2D grid coordinates in zigzag column order starting from \[0,0\], given <code>cols</code> and <code>rows</code>.<!-- -->Ported &amp; modified from original Java code by Christopher Kulla. [https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/SpiralBucketOrder.java](https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/SpiralBucketOrder.java) |
|  [zigzagDiagonal2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.zigzagdiagonal2d.md) | Similar to [diagonal2d()](./grid-iterators.diagonal2d.md)<!-- -->, but yields 2D grid coordinates in zigzag diagonal order starting at \[0,0\] and using given <code>cols</code> and <code>rows</code>. |
|  [zigzagRows2d(cols, rows)](./grid-iterators.zigzagrows2d.md) | Yields sequence of 2D grid coordinates in zigzag row order starting from \[0,0\], given <code>cols</code> and <code>rows</code>.<!-- -->Ported &amp; modified from original Java code by Christopher Kulla. [https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/SpiralBucketOrder.java](https://sourceforge.net/p/sunflow/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/src/org/sunflow/core/bucket/SpiralBucketOrder.java) |
